00111 class IRpropPlus : public Optimizer
00112 {
00113         public:
00114 
00115         void init(Model& model)
00116         {
00117                 initRprop(model);
00118 
00119                 int i, ic = model.getParameterDimension();
00120                 for (i=0; i<ic; i++) delta(i) = 0.01 * model.getParameter(i);
00121         }
00122 
00123 //===========================================================================
00153 void initRprop(Model& model, double _delta0 = 0.01, double np = 1.2, double nm = 0.5, double dMax = 50.0, double dMin = 1e-6)
00154 {
00155         deltaw.resize(model.getParameterDimension(), false);
00156         delta.resize(model.getParameterDimension(), false);
00157         dedwOld.resize(model.getParameterDimension(), false);
00158         delta  = _delta0; 
00159         deltaw = 0; 
00160         dedwOld  = 0; 
00161 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00162         oldE = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00163 #else
00164         oldE = 1e309;
00165 #endif
00166         increaseFactor = np;
00167         decreaseFactor = nm;
00168         upperStepLimit = dMax;
00169         lowerStepLimit = dMin;
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 //===========================================================================
00199 double optimize(Model& model, ErrorFunction& errorfunction, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00200 {
00201         int p, pc = model.getParameterDimension();
00202 
00203         double param;
00204         Array<double> dedw(pc);
00205 
00206         double newE = errorfunction.errorDerivative(model, input, target, dedw);
00207 
00208         for (p=0; p<pc; p++)
00209         {
00210                 param = model.getParameter(p);
00211 
00212                 if (dedw(p) * dedwOld(p) > 0.0)
00213                 {
00214                         delta(p) = min(upperStepLimit, increaseFactor * delta(p));
00215                         deltaw(p) = delta(p) * -sgn(dedw(p));
00216                         model.setParameter(p, param + deltaw(p));
00217                         dedwOld(p) = dedw(p);
00218                 }
00219                 else if (dedw(p) * dedwOld(p) < 0.0)
00220                 {
00221                         delta(p) = max(lowerStepLimit, decreaseFactor * delta(p));
00222                         if(oldE < newE)
00223                         {
00224                                 model.setParameter(p, param - deltaw(p));
00225                         }
00226                         dedwOld(p) = 0.0;
00227                 }
00228                 else
00229                 {
00230                         deltaw(p) = delta(p) * -sgn(dedw(p));
00231                         model.setParameter(p, param + deltaw(p));
00232                         dedwOld(p) = dedw(p);
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 if (! model.isFeasible())
00236                 {
00237                         model.setParameter(p, param);
00238                         delta(p) = max(lowerStepLimit, decreaseFactor * delta(p));
00239                 }
00240         }
00241 
00242         oldE = newE;
00243         return newE; 
00244 }
00245 
00246 
00247 protected:
00248 //===========================================================================
00265         int sgn(double x) 
00266         { 
00267                 if (x > 0) return 1; if (x < 0) return -1; return 0; 
00268         }
00269 
00271         double min(double x, double y) { return x < y ? x : y; }
00272 
00274         double max(double x, double y) { return x > y ? x : y; }
00275 
00277         double oldE;
00278 
00280         Array<double> deltaw;     
00281 
00283         Array<double> dedwOld;
00284 
00286         Array<double> delta;
00287 
00289         double increaseFactor;
00290 
00292         double decreaseFactor;
00293 
00295         double upperStepLimit;
00296 
00298         double lowerStepLimit;
00299 };
